channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'I want his name to be known:' Wife of immigrant injured at ICE facility shooting speaks out

item.title: Marc Maron, Human Rights Watch and others slam Saudi comedy festival
item.description: The participation of big name funnymen, including Dave Chappelle, Aziz Ansari and Kevin Hart, provoked criticism from fellow comedians and human right...

item.title: 'The cases swung, not me': Ex-Justice Kennedy reflects on a changing Supreme Court
item.description: In an interview with NPR to be aired in October, Kennedy said he is "very worried" about America today.

item.title: George E. Hardy, Tuskegee Airman, dies at 100
item.description: George E. Hardy was the youngest Red Tail fighter pilot at 19 years old and completed 21 missions across Europe during World War II.

item.title: Did a teen stab his twin sister to death while sleepwalking?

item.title: 9/27: CBS Weekend News
item.description: Deadly flooding in Arizona with intense weather threats across the U.S.; “This is not a joke”: California neighbors contend with aggressive squirrel

item.title: The US navy killed 17 in deadly strikes. Now Venezuela is giving civilians guns
item.description: Tensions between the two countries have increased after the US Navy targeted boats off the coast of Venezuela.

item.title: Iran warned not to escalate tensions as UN sanctions reimposed
item.description: The UK, France and Germany say restrictions are back in place over concerns about Iran's nuclear programme.

item.title: At least 4 dead in Arizona following devastating flooding
item.description: In the rural community of Globe, one of Arizona's oldest mining towns, sheriff deputies are looking into reports of people who may be missing.

item.title: Brutal killings of young women leave Argentina in shock and anger
item.description: Thousands march demanding justice for three victims whose murders were livestreamed on social media.

item.title: U.N. hits Iran with "snapback" sanctions over its nuclear program
item.description: The sanctions will again freeze Iranian assets abroad, halt arms deals with Tehran, and penalize any development of Iran's ballistic missile program, ...

item.title: Airstrikes and shooting kill at least 91 people in Gaza as calls for ceasefire grow
item.description: Among the dead were those hit by two strikes in the Nuseirat refugee cam, including women and children, according to staff at al-Awda Hospital.

item.title: Comey's indictment marks a dramatic escalation in Trump's political retribution efforts
item.description: Former FBI Director James Comey has been indicted after a push by President Trump. The move marks a dramatic escalation in Trump's effort to go after ...

item.title: Trump asks Supreme Court to uphold restrictions he wants to impose on birthright citizenship
Instagram vs reality: Bali is becoming a victim of its own success
item.description: Millions flock to Bali to Eat, Pray, Love. They also get crowds, traffic and the cacophony of construction.

item.title: Tropical weather in the Atlantic slams the Caribbean and may hit Southeast US next
Swiss vote on electronic identity cards for second time
item.description: The proposal was revised after voters rejected the idea in 2021 amid concerns over data protection.

item.title: Trump says he will send troops to Portland, Oregon, in latest deployment to US cities
